description.mekmm.recycler: レシピがある、不要なものを再生可能なものにリサイクルする機械です。
description.mekmm.planting_station: 作物を自動で栽培、収穫できる発展的な機械です。
description.mekmm.cnc_stamper: 金型を使用して物品に打ち付け、圧力で加工する機械です。
description.mekmm.cnc_lathe: 様々な機能を用いて材料を加工する機械です。
description.mekmm.cnc_rolling_mill: 機械的な力を利用して金属を曲げる機械です。
description.mekmm.replicator: 物理法則に逆らい、特定の物質を利用して物体を複製することが出来る機械です。
description.mekmm.fluid_replicator: A machine that violates the laws of physics and can replicate fluids using a certain substance.
description.mekmm.chemical_replicator: A machine that violates the laws of physics and can replicate chemicals using a certain substance.
description.mekmm.ambient_gas_collector: 大気中から謎の物質を抽出する機械です。
description.mekmm.wireless_charging_stat: A machine for wireless charging of inventory and armor (including Curios, if you have one).
description.mekmm.author_doll: このModの作者のスキンを纏った人形です。愛でましょう。
tooltip.mekmm.is_blocking: 機械の上部が塞がれています
tooltip.mekmm.no_blocking: 機械の上部は塞がれていません
info.mekmm.jei.unstable_dimensional_gas: Use an Ambient Gas Collector for collection(%1$smb/t), and be careful not to place blocks above the machine.
configuration.mekmm.general.chemical_rep: The recipes added here will be added to the chemical replicator. Write using modid:registeredName#amount, # followed by the amount(not null or zero) of UU matter consumed. For example:["mekanism:oxygen#10","mekanism:hydrogen#100"]
configuration.mekmm.general.fluid_replic: The recipes added here will be added to the fluid replicator. Write using modid:registeredName#amount, # followed by the amount(not null or zero) of UU matter consumed. For example:["minecraft:water#10","mekanism:heavy_water#100"]
configuration.mekmm.general.item_replica: The recipes added here will be added to the item replicator. Write using modid:registeredName#amount, # followed by the amount(not null or zero) of UU matter consumed. For example:["minecraft:stone#10","mekanism:basic_bin#100"]
configuration.mekmm.general.charging.rat: Amount of Energy(joules) an item can receive per tick from a Wireless Charging Station.
configuration.mekmm.general.collect.amou: mB of Unstable Dimensional Gas collected by the Ambient Gas Collector.
configuration.mekmm.storage.wireless_cha: Base energy storage in Joules of: Wireless Charging Station
